ada-hub command
***********************

.. argparse::
   :module: ada_hub.lib.helpers.parser
   :func: parse_args
   :prog: ada-hub

   cli
        Run the program in command-line mode. This is useful if you're running a headless set-up

        See :doc:`cmd_cli`

    gui
        Run the program in Graphical User Interface mode

        See :doc:`cmd_gui`

    credits
        Show the credits for the application. This includes developers, API providers, and credit to artists who \
        helped make icons, pictures, etc

        See :doc:`cmd_credits`
